channel.title: Putting Highscores on my site?
channel.description: how would I acess runescapes site and then put it on my site like RuneHQ and tip.it? and after I get the information how would I put it on say a site that the user enters in there and clicks a button to show there highscores? kind of like Swift Switch. If you have any idea's on how to do this please post here. thanks :)

item.title: Putting Highscores on my site?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

you could use php or somthing nasty like that, the easiest way would be to convert the java app on the pastebin to an applet and put it on your website

Read full topic

item.title: Putting Highscores on my site?
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

well an idea would be to parse the html using functions like explode and mid and all that and store them into an array.

Then using basic html/php display it in a table.
